subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: The Champions Tour rookie Mark O’Meara shot an eight-under-par 63 to take the first-round lead in the AT&T Championship in San Antonio. John Cook and Wayne Levi were two strokes back.
snippet: The Champions Tour rookie Mark O’Meara shot an eight-under-par 63 to take the first-round lead in the AT&T Championship in San Antonio. John Cook and Wayne Levi were two strokes back.
